Name: C$
Attack_Vector: System drive access with admin rights

Name: CertEnroll
Attack_Vector: Certificate template enumeration, ESC1/ESC2/ESC3 attacks possible

Name: IPC$
Attack_Vector: Inter-Process Communication, enumeration and lateral movement

Attack_Vector: Full R/W access - payload staging, lateral movement, data exfiltration

Name: public

Comment: Basic Read share for all domain users
GOAD_Context: Public read-only share for domain users
